content: Just talking with the RSNA team on http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201801_Apps_for_Imaging_Research -- they're wondering when they should be hearing back. Has this been reviewed/approved?
AFAIK we aren't stopping anything - I'll go look...
So it's all set up - there's a link in the connectathon page - they're good to go!
np - we don't normally go back to the sponsoring groups, which was the issue here I think...
